name: Super Pocket Tennis [PSP]
description:
Become a tennis superstar as you serve, smash, lob and volley your way to the top! Super Pocket Tennis gives you fun and exciting tennis action on the go. Fight your way to the championship as you compete in tournaments around the world. Super Pocket Tennis – time to serve up some fun!
• 20 unique characters – all with different styles of play
• Compete in singles or doubles matches
• Hone your skills with fun and challenging mini-games
• Play on a variety of different court types including grass, carpet, hard and clay
• Take on your friends with wireless play for up to 4 players
Super Pocket Tennis © Hunex. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. Published by D3Publisher. Developed by Hunex.
